page.title: 16Warningore House and Farm
page.content: themselves.They have 3 mowers,1 strimmer and 1 cultivator. { Warningore Farm}was mainly a dairy farm.They have 100 friesian cows and 100 assorted calves.They keep the females and send the bulls to market for meat.They have 150 sheep including fat lambs.They keep 50 ewes and 6 rams and the rest go to market. They have 50 acres of land for crops, quarter wheat and three quarters corn barley.All the land is rented.Ten acres is rented from Warningore House. The sons go out shooting rabbits because they eat the crops.Pigeons and rooks are a pest as well.A person comes from Boots to suggest the best spray for their crops.They have 6 workers.One of their jobs is cleaning the combine harvester with hot air. They have special masks to protect them from the hay that flies about.
